text: Anaconda is a 1997 American adventure horror movie. It was directed by Luis Llosa. It starred with Jennifer Lopez, Ice Cube, Jon Voight, Eric Stoltz, Jonathan Hyde and Owen Wilson. It focuses on a documentary film crew in the Amazon rainforest that is captured by a snake hunter who is hunting down a giant, legendary green anaconda. The movie received mostly negative reviews but was a box office success. It grossed $136.8 million worldwide against a $45 million budget. It also became a cult classic. It was followed by a series of films. == Cast == * Jennifer Lopez as Terri Flores * Ice Cube as Danny Rich * Jon Voight as Paul Serone * Eric Stoltz as Dr. Steven Cale * Jonathan Hyde as Warren Westridge * Owen Wilson as Gary Dixon * Kari Wuhrer as Denise Kalberg * Vincent Castellanos as Mateo * Danny Trejo as Poacher == References == == Other websites == * * * * * Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in South America Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies directed by Luis Llosa Category:Movies about hunters Category:Movies about snakes Category:Jungle movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American monster movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Peruvian movies Category:1990s horror thriller movies Category:1990s monster movies Category:1997 adventure movies Category:1997 horror movies Category:1997 thriller movies Category:Anaconda movies
title: Anaconda (movie)
